sentences.en: All the critics considered the book a masterpiece.
sentences.cn: 所有的批评家都认为这本书是件杰作.

sentences.en: Billy Budd is lucid and graceful - a quietly assured masterpiece.
sentences.cn: 《毕利·伯德》却明晰而优美 —— 一部朴实无华的真正杰作.
他对这件杰作施以改良.

sentences.en: His book, I must add, is a masterpiece.
sentences.cn: 我必须补充一点：他的书是一部杰作。

sentences.en: In this masterpiece is embodied his life - time of painstaking work.
sentences.cn: 这部名著凝聚着他毕生的心血.

sentences.en: Mary Shelley was just 18 when she wrote the horror masterpiece ‘Frankenstein’.
sentences.cn: 玛丽•雪莱创作《科学怪人》这部恐怖小说名作的时候年仅18岁。
《罗宾逊漂流记》是笛福的杰作.

sentences.en: She produced regular pot - boilers while also working on her masterpiece.
sentences.cn: 她一面不断发表为口的作品,一面搞她的大作.

sentences.en: She was a terrific ship, and a masterpiece of naval construction.
sentences.cn: 她是一艘威力很大的战舰, 是军舰建造史上的一项杰作.

sentences.en: The coach was a masterpiece of Teutonic engineering.
sentences.cn: 这种长途汽车是体现德国工程设计水平的杰作。

sentences.en: The film was built up to be a masterpiece, but I found it very disappointing.
sentences.cn: 这部影片被吹捧为杰作, 可是我觉得令人失望.

sentences.en: The marble sculpture is a masterpiece.
sentences.cn: 这大理石雕刻是件杰作.

sentences.en: The report is a masterpiece of brevity.
sentences.cn: 那份报告是言简意赅的典范。

sentences.en: The whole thing was a masterpiece of crowd management.
sentences.cn: 整件事情就是人群管理的典范。

sentences.en: This book is a real masterpiece.

trans.tran_en: a work of art, a piece of writing or music etc that is of very high quality or that is the best that a particular artist, writer etc has produced
